citations.narrative:
Mr. Lasho has one hedgehog on display for sale at Cook’s Flea Market at 11:30 on 11/18/17. He also is displaying
hamsters and gerbils for sale. No sales of wild/exotic mammals are permitted without a license. Sales of small
domestic animals including hamsters and gerbils of more than $500/year are not permitted without a license. Mr.
Lasho agrees to apply for a dealer’s license at this time.
No covered activities are permitted until USDA license is obtained.
Inspection and exit briefing conducted with Mr. Lasho.

narrative:
2.1(a)(1)                    REPEAT
REQUIREMENTS AND APPLICATION.
Mr. Lasho has one hedgehog on display for sale at Cook’s Flea Market at 11:30 on 11/18/17.  He also is displaying
hamsters and gerbils for sale.  No sales of wild/exotic mammals are permitted without a license.  Sales of small
domestic animals including hamsters and gerbils of more than $500/year are not permitted without a license. Mr.
Lasho agrees to apply for a dealer’s license at this time.
No covered activities are permitted until USDA license is obtained.  
Inspection and exit briefing conducted with Mr. Lasho.

species.common: DJUNGARIAN / RUSSIAN WINTER WHITE DWARF HAMSTER
